alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crockett, north central Hardeman, east central Haywood and Madison Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jackson, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Humboldt, Fairview, Bells, Three Way, Bemis, Holly Grove, Adair, Cloverport, Mercer, Carroll, Gadsden, Medon, Neely, Allens, Huntersville, Westover, Madison Hall and Uptonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
